summary: Motivated by Box Office statistics, Dax Shepard has made a decision to leave comedy to pursue his dream of becoming an international Martial Arts action star.
cast: Dax Shepard|Nate Tuck|Greg Siegel|James Feldman|Andrew Panay|Ashton Kutcher|Tom Arnold|Laura Labo|Jon Favreau|Josh Temple|Rome Shadanloo|Chevonne Moore|Jordan Morris|Bradley Cooper|David Koechner|Charlie Koechner|Jess Rowland|Michael Rosenbaum|Ryan Hansen|Steve Tisch|Seth Green|David Palmer|Margot Koechner|Laura Labo
title: Brother's Justice
